item.title: Automated visual testing with Percy
item.description: I shared my last post with some friends, and soon found out that the images and videos didn’t load on Safari. What better time than to introduce an overly complicated automated testing process to catch these problems in the future! I first checked my site in BrowserStack. Sure enough, it didn’t display correctly on any iPhones or Safari on MacOS. I’d heard of Percy before, but never used it. It takes snapshots of your site, and provides a visual tool for comparing differences as you make changes.
